info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 04 at 2:22PM CDT until May 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALFALFA...WEST CENTRAL GARFIELD AND EASTERN MAJOR COUNTIES... At 221 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairview, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fairview, Helena, Lahoma, Ringwood, Cleo Springs, Goltry, Meno, Aline, Carrier, Orienta and Isabella. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
